core_network_plmn.title: Core Network PLMN
core_network_plmn.description: Core Network Public Land Mobile Network

gtp_addr_list.title: GTP Address List
gtp_addr_list.description: IP addresses (and an optional port) on which the GTP-U packets are received. The default port is 2152

anyOf.title: Automatic address
anyOf.description: IPv4 LAN: IPv4 on the ethernet LAN the Core Network is connected to. Ipv6 Re6st address: acquired through the Re6st VPN software. Localhost address: for eNBs / gNBs running on the same machine

gtp_payload_mtu.title: GTP Payload MTU
gtp_payload_mtu.description: Range 68 to 16384. MTU in bytes for the GTP-U payload. Do not forget to update the network interface MTU accordingly for optimal performance. For example with a GTP MTU of 1500 bytes, interface should have a MTU of at least 1564 bytes.

iperf3.title: iperf3 UDP server count
iperf3.description: Activate one or multiple iperf3 UDP server

local_domain.title: Local Domain
local_domain.description: Activates local DNS server serving the given domain name

network_short_name.title: Network Short Name
network_short_name.description: Network short name displayed on UE

fixed_ips.title: Fixed IP for the UE
fixed_ips.description: Set to true to force a static IPv4 for each UE. If true, the number of UE is limited.

pdn_list.title: PDN list
pdn_list.description: Configure the available EPS Packet Data Networks and 5GS Data Network Names.

qci.title: QCI of default E-RAB
qci.description: QoS Class Identifier of the default E-RAB

eps_5gs_interworking.title: EPS 5GS Interworking
eps_5gs_interworking.description: Defines whether inter RAT mobility between EPS and 5GS is supported or not, and whether N26 interface is supported or not. Note that interworking with N26 is required to perform handover between EPS and 5GS.

hss_addr.title: HSS Address
hss_addr.description: IP address and optional port of the HSS used for S6a interface. The default port is 3868.

hss_bind_addr.title: HSS Bind Address
hss_bind_addr.description: IP address and optional port on which the S6a SCTP connection is bound. The default address is the same as the S1AP SCTP connection.

s6_origin_realm.title: S6 Origin Realm
s6_origin_realm.description: Defines the string sent in the Origin-Realm AVP for S6 messages. Default is set to mnc<MNC>.mcc<MCC>.3gppnetwork.org.

s6_origin_host.title: S6 Origin Host
s6_origin_host.description: Defines the string sent in the Origin-Host AVP for S6 messages. Default is set to epc.mnc<MNC>.mcc<MCC>.3gppnetwork.org.

ecc_params.title: ECC Parameters
ecc_params.description: Set the ECC network configuration for the SUPI protection and de-concealment of the SUCI. Applicable to 5GC only

oneOf.title: Profile A
oneOf.description: Home network private key for profile A protection scheme

oneOf.title: Profile B
oneOf.description: Home network private key for profile B protection scheme

lock.title: Force reprocess
lock.description: Expert only: change this parameter value to force reprocess of partition

private_key.title: Private Key
private_key.description: Home network private key in hexadecimal format (32 bytes)
